game_description: You Play as Erica who follows the adventurous steps of her grandfather. Find all Ancient Scrolls while you trying to make your way to the escape door. Solve series of Puzzles and riddles! Explore numerous rooms and locations, find hidden items,clues and escape before time runs out! Play with a new fresh type of Realistic Gameplay for escape rooms! Forget about Old casual escape room or point and click games... BE IN THE ROOM! Begin your Adventure today and make your True Escape! FEATURES Movement : Locomotion/RoomScale/Teleport Amazing High Detailed Graphics Puzzles and Items Change Every Time you Play 10 Levels with 80+ Rooms to explore Over 10 Hours of Gameplay Challenging Puzzles Thrilling Music and Sound Effects Player Interactive Gaming Enviroment Intelligent Inventory System Unique Scoring system with Global Scoreboards *Please Note that a network connection is also required for submitting your scores. *Game Progress is stored Localy, please backup before uninstalling.
review_1: I enjoy the game but when it loads the screen flashes and I have to quit game several times till it loads where I can play it would give it 5 stars if it wasn't for that..
review_2: Functional puzzle game in the format of 10 escape rooms. Successfully played through all 10 rooms. Got stumped on a couple puzzles and every time it turned out the hint/solution was hidden underneath or behind something that I didn't realize moved.

And God for bid you second-guess yourself wondering if you made sure to hit ￼the lock button after every single guess attempt . I mean come on, and the references to the order of the colors anywhere in these low color rooms? I don’t care how long you stared at any of the rooms you’re not gonna find any color pattern anywhere. And if it’s there, this should tell you it’s way too difficult to find. I really like the game otherwise mechanically graphics are ok, but way way too difficult that it’s not even fun.
